alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:12PM MST until January 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and dangerously cold wind chills expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Wind chills between 25 and 35 below zero. * WHERE...Cody Foothills, North Big Horn Basin, Southwest Big Horn Basin and Southeast Big Horn Basin. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
